structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: A housing authority may contract with the federal government to manage or operate any low-income housing erected or owned by the federal government.
law.history: Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 237, sec. 12, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 361, sec. 14, effective July 13, 1984. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 927a-16, 2741x-14.
